metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2868 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
libtiff's tiffcrop utility has a improper input validation flaw that canlead to out of bounds read and ultimately cause a crash if an attacker isable to supply a crafted file to tiffcrop.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2868` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.8').
